name: validate_content
description:
Validate XSIAM content files using demisto-sdk.

Checks:
- YAML structure and schema compliance
- Required fields present
- Naming conventions
- Dependencies resolved
- Backward compatibility

Run after generating or modifying content.

path.description: Path to content file or pack directory. Example: 'Packs/MyPack' or 'Packs/MyPack/Scripts/MyScript/MyScript.yml'
